JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Dean Spielmann;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP and NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the applicant concluded an investment agreement with PERSON , a representative of ORG ( “ RMB ” ) . According to information given to the applicant by PERSON was a subsidiary of ORG ( “ ORG ” ) , an international investment and stock - trading company based in GPE . PERSON also claimed to be an official representative of ORG in GPE . The applicant invested MONEY ( USD ) . In exchange , he was promised high profits from international stock exchange operations to be carried out by RMB dealers .

In DATE the applicant was informed that all of the money that he had invested had been lost due to unsuccessful stock - trading deals . The applicant demanded financial reports proving this , but they were not made available to him .

The applicant brought an action against MONEY and ORG , demanding compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage . On DATE ORG rejected the claim , finding that RMB , and PERSON personally , could not be held responsible for the loss of the applicant ’s money because the contract had formally been concluded between the applicant and ORG . According to the contract terms , all disputes were to be resolved under GPE law . The court advised the applicant to lodge a lawsuit against ORG in GPE .

The applicant lodged an appeal . He asked the court , inter alia , to institute criminal proceedings against MONEY . On DATE ORG delivered an interim decision ( qərardad ) instructing ORG to investigate whether the actions of RMB , and PERSON personally , involved any elements of such criminal offences as fraud , illegal business dealings , false advertising and falsification of official seals and documents . ORG stayed the civil proceedings pending the conclusion of the criminal investigation .

On DATE ORG refused to institute criminal proceedings , finding that the matter did not raise any issues under criminal law . This decision was upheld on DATE and CARDINAL DATE by ORG and ORG respectively .

Thereafter , ORG resumed the suspended civil proceedings . Following an expert examination ordered by the court , it was established that certain documents pertaining to the applicant ’s transaction and the partnership agreements between RMB and ORG had been falsified .

On DATE the ORG quashed ORG judgment of DATE . The court found that , at the relevant time , RMB had not been properly set up as a legal entity in GPE , that ORG had no subsidiaries in GPE , that the “ partnership ” documents between RMB and ORG were false , and that the alleged official seals of ORG used on the investment agreement signed with the applicant were also false . The court partially upheld the applicant ’s claim , ordering PERSON to compensate him for pecuniary damage in the amount of ORG CARDINAL . The court rejected the applicant ’s claim for non - pecuniary damages .
ORG judgment of CARDINAL DATE became operative immediately upon its delivery . On DATE ORG issued a writ of execution of the judgment .
Both the applicant and PERSON lodged cassation appeals against ORG judgment of CARDINAL DATE . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment .
On DATE ORG instituted criminal proceedings for falsification of documents by RMB .

It appears from the case file that , following the institution of the enforcement proceedings , ORG applied to various public authorities , including ORG , ORG and ORG , asking for information on PERSON ’s property . However , according to the respective letters of DATE , DATE and DATE of the aforementioned public authorities , PERSON did not possess any property in GPE .
Moreover , it was established that PERSON did not have a permanent residence in GPE and , according to his father ’s statement , had been abroad since DATE .

Upon the request of ORG , on DATE was reprimanded in absentia by ORG under Article CARDINAL ( non - execution of court judgments ) of LAW due to the continued non - execution of the judgment of CARDINAL DATE .
According to the information provided by the ORG , the judgment was executed in full on DATE and the applicant received ORG CARDINAL .
